thread.title: A Slice Of Serenity In The Heart Of The Big Apple - Review
thread.title_full: A Slice Of Serenity In The Heart Of The Big Apple - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rutman
title: A Slice Of Serenity In The Heart Of The Big Apple - Review
text: This is a charming boutique hotel that, once inside its doors, will make you think you are in a guest hotel in the English countryside rather than 1/4 block off Times Square. The service is friendly and attentive, the rooms well appointed and quiet. Another highlight is Rick's Lounge that serves a nice continental breakfast, wine and cheese in the evening, and has coffees and snacks 24/7. It's a great place to relax before heading out to eat or caching a show. Treat yourself to a great experience.
